trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of feature upgrade actions.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能升级操作的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IAddContentTypeFieldUpgradeAction" /> action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IAddContentTypeFieldUpgradeAction" /> 操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

trans-unit.source: The new upgrade action added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

trans-unit.source: When adding a new field to a content type, you should programmatically add the field to existing content types.
trans-unit.target: 当将新字段添加到的内容类型，你应以编程方式将字段添加到现有内容类型中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IApplyElementManifestsUpgradeAction" /> upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IApplyElementManifestsUpgradeAction" /> 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

trans-unit.source: The new upgrade action added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

trans-unit.source: New field definitions are provisioned for new activations of the containing feature.
trans-unit.target: 新的字段定义为包含功能的新的激活设置。

trans-unit.source: Existing activations of the feature do not automatically get new field definitions, so features must be force-reactivated by using code to receive any changes.
trans-unit.target: 功能的现有激活不会自动获取新的字段定义，因此功能必须强制重新激活通过使用代码可以接收的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.ICustomUpgradeAction" /> upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.ICustomUpgradeAction" /> 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

trans-unit.source: The new upgrade action added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IMapFileUpgradeAction" /> upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IMapFileUpgradeAction" /> 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

trans-unit.source: The new upgrade action added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的新升级操作。

trans-unit.source: Maps an uncustomized file from the Office 12 folder to the Office 14 folder.
trans-unit.target: 将映射到 Office 14 文件夹 Office 12 文件夹中的非自定义的文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IVersionRange" /> upgrade action to the feature upgrade actions collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Features.IVersionRange" /> 升级操作添加到功能升级操作集合。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a version range.
trans-unit.target: 表示版本范围的对象。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the upgrade actions in the element should applied only for the specified version range.
trans-unit.target: 指定在元素中的升级操作应仅对指定的版本范围内的应用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about upgrading features, see [Upgrading Features](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610).
trans-unit.target: 有关升级功能的详细信息，请参阅[升级功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178610)。
